ygData.subject: re: warrior upgrade in new patch
ygData.msgSnippet: i believe that the hps dont take effect until lvl 20. zamtik
ygData.messageBody:
i believe that the hps dont take effect until lvl 20.

zamtik

On 28 Jul 1999 slu@... wrote:

> From: <slu@...>
>
> Some of my experiences with Crit Hit last night in Unrest (lvl 20 Warrior wielding Dragoon Dirk & Combine Long Sword) differed from what you reported.
>
> Actually I reeled off three critical strikes in a row last night (slash, pierce, kick). It can happen more quickly than every 60 tries. It also might be one more incentive to go the dual wield route rather than 2 handed sword (more attacks more crit strikes).
>
> Also, I saw damage ranging from 2X to 3X on crit hits. I had a one handed slash with a combine long sword do 36 pts (norm is 13pts max). I also had kicks do 24 pts (norm is 11 pts max).
>
> My magic resist (unbuffed) jumped to 38 (2 of which are attributable to the dirk). I also saw a net gain of roughly 30-40 hps (592 unbuffed with a sta of 84)
>
> Regards
>
> Flair Shieldbreaker on Fennin Ro
>
> > ** Original Subject: [warriors_eq] warrior upgrade in new patch
> > ** Original Sender: "Trent Carroll" <trent@...>
> > ** Original Date: Tue, 27 Jul 1999 20:02:55 -0500
>
> > ** Original Message follows...
>
> >
> > From: "Trent Carroll" <trent@...>
> >
> > The warrior upgrade is in the new patch.
> >
> > 1) Critical Strike happens about one in 60 hits for around double damage
> > 2) More HP. talked to a level 24 Troll warrior he got 34 more HP overnight.
> > My level 14 Dark Elf Warrior went from 401 to 399 (yes I lost two hp)
> > 3) Magic resistance. I think you gain one magic resistance for every two
> > levels.
> >
